actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Federal Energy Administration to undertake a continuing study of the nature, quantities, and country of origin of all petroleum and petroleum products imported into the United States.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of the Federal Energy Administration to undertake a continuing study of the nature, quantities, and country of origin of all petroleum and petroleum products imported into the United States.

titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Federal Energy Administration to undertake a continuing study of the nature, quantities, and country of origin of all petroleum and petroleum products imported into the United States.
